query.name: get_all_transactions
query.sql:
SELECT l.entry_amount,l.memorandum,l.entry_datetime,l.entry_id, ( SELECT SUM(ll.entry_amount) FROM &pb_general_ledger; AS ll WHERE ll.account_id = l.account_id AND ( ll.entry_datetime < l.entry_datetime OR ( ll.entry_datetime = l.entry_datetime AND ll.entry_amount >= l.entry_amount ) ) ) as balance
FROM (&pb_accounts; AS a), (&pb_general_ledger; AS l)
WHERE
l.account_id = ?
AND l.account_id=a.id
AND l.entry_datetime >= ? AND l.entry_datetime <= ? AND l.fiscal_period_id LIKE ?
GROUP BY l.transaction_id
ORDER BY ABS(l.entry_amount) DESC, l.entry_amount ASC, l.entry_id, CASE ? WHEN 'ASC' THEN l.entry_datetime END ASC, CASE ? WHEN 'DESC' THEN l.entry_datetime END DESC, CASE ? WHEN 'ASC' THEN l.entry_amount END DESC, CASE ? WHEN 'DESC' THEN l.entry_amount END ASC
LIMIT ?,?
